text: There wasn't just romance in the air when Justin Bieber's dad, Jeremy, said ` ` I do'' to Chelsey Rebelo in Jamaica on Feb. 19. With Chelsey expecting a baby girl this summer, there was also baby fever going around — particularly for groomsman Justin, 24, and his girlfriend Selena Gomez, 25. ` ` Justin and Selena are talking babies now!'' a source exclusively tells Life & Style. ` ` They spent a lot of their time at the wedding playing with all the kids, and they both think it ’ s the perfect time to take their relationship to the next level.''
